Technique: FORMED BY HAND; PAINTED; FAYENCE; WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Shabti of king Pinedjem I
Description: This beautiful shabti in blue faience was part of the collection Ã‰. de Meester de Ravestein. The hieroglyphic inscription contains the royal cartouche of Pinudjem I, high priest of Thebes. The piece comes without any doubt from the royal Cachette of Deir el-Bahari.
